mil5.2.4:3.3.pli: ratanasuttaṃ mettasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ moraparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ aṅgulimālaparittaṃ.

mil5.2.4:3.4.pli: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, ākāsagatopi samuddamajjhagatopi pāsādakuṭileṇaguhāpabbhāradaribilagirivivarapabbatantaragatopi na muccati maccupāsā, tena hi parittakammaṃ micchā.

mil5.2.4:3.5.pli: Yadi parittakaraṇena maccupāsā parimutti bhavati, tena hi ‘na antalikkhe …pe…

mil5.2.4:3.7.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.2.4:4.2.pli: maccupāsā’ti, parittā ca bhagavatā uddiṭṭhā, tañca pana sāvasesāyukassa vayasampannassa apetakammāvaraṇassa, natthi, mahārāja, khīṇāyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā vā upakkamo vā.

mil5.2.4:5.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, matassa rukkhassa sukkhassa koḷāpassa nisnehassa uparuddhajīvitassa gatāyusaṅkhārassa kumbhasahassenapi udake ākirante allattaṃ vā pallavitaharitabhāvo vā na bhaveyya;

mil5.2.4:5.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, bhesajjaparittakammena natthi khīṇāyukassa ṭhitiyā kiriyā vā upakkamo vā, yāni tāni, mahārāja, mahiyā osadhāni bhesajjāni, tānipi khīṇāyukassa akiccakarāni bhavanti.

mil5.2.4:5.3.pli: Sāvasesāyukaṃ, mahārāja, vayasampannaṃ apetakammāvaraṇaṃ parittaṃ rakkhati gopeti, tassatthāya bhagavatā parittā uddiṭṭhā.

mil5.2.4:6.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, kassako paripakke dhaññe mate sassanāḷe udakappavesanaṃ vāreyya, yaṃ pana sassaṃ taruṇaṃ meghasannibhaṃ vayasampannaṃ, taṃ udakavaḍḍhiyā vaḍḍhati.

mil5.2.4:6.2.pli: Evameva kho, mahārāja, khīṇāyukassa bhesajjaparittakiriyā ṭhapitā paṭikkhittā, ye pana te manussā sāvasesāyukā vayasampannā, tesaṃ atthāya parittabhesajjāni bhaṇitāni, te parittabhesajjehi vaḍḍhantī”ti.

mil5.2.4:7.1.pli: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, khīṇāyuko marati, sāvasesāyuko jīvati, tena hi parittabhesajjāni niratthakāni hontī”ti?

mil5.2.4:7.2.pli: “Diṭṭhapubbo pana tayā, mahārāja, koci rogo bhesajjehi paṭinivattito”ti?

mil5.2.4:7.4.pli: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhavatī”ti.

mil5.2.4:8.1.pli: “Dissanti, bhante nāgasena, vejjānaṃ upakkamā bhesajjapānānulepā, tena tesaṃ upakkamena rogo paṭinivattatī”ti.

mil5.2.4:8.2.pli: “Parittānampi, mahārāja, pavattīyamānānaṃ saddo suyyati, jivhā sukkhati, hadayaṃ byāvaṭṭati, kaṇṭho āturati.

mil5.2.4:8.3.pli: Tena tesaṃ pavattena sabbe byādhayo vūpasamanti, sabbā ītiyo apagacchantīti.

mil5.2.4:9.1.pli: Diṭṭhapubbo pana tayā, mahārāja, koci ahinā daṭṭho mantapadena visaṃ pātīyamāno visaṃ cikkhassanto uddhamadho ācamayamāno”ti?

mil5.2.4:9.3.pli: “Tena hi, mahārāja, ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhavati.

mil5.2.4:9.4.pli: Kataparittañhi, mahārāja, purisaṃ ḍaṃsitukāmo ahi na ḍaṃsati, vivaṭaṃ mukhaṃ pidahati, corānaṃ ukkhittalaguḷampi na sambhavati, te laguḷaṃ muñcitvā pemaṃ karonti, kupitopi hatthināgo samāgantvā uparamati, pajjalitamahāaggikkhandhopi upagantvā nibbāyati, visaṃ halāhalampi khāyitaṃ agadaṃ sampajjati, āhāratthaṃ vā pharati, vadhakā hantukāmā upagantvā dāsabhūtā sampajjanti, akkantopi pāso na saṃvarati.

mil5.2.4:10.1.pli: Sutapubbaṃ pana tayā, mahārāja, ‘morassa kataparittassa sattavassasatāni luddako nāsakkhi pāsaṃ upanetuṃ, akataparittassa taṃ yeva divasaṃ pāsaṃ upanesī’”ti?

mil5.2.4:10.2.pli: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato so saddo sadevake loke”ti.

mil5.2.4:10.3.pli: “Tena hi, mahārāja ‘parittabhesajjakiriyā niratthakā’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhavati.

mil5.2.4:11.1.pli: Sutapubbaṃ pana tayā, mahārāja, ‘dānavo bhariyaṃ parirakkhanto samugge pakkhipitvā gilitvā kucchinā pariharati, atheko vijjādharo tassa dānavassa mukhena pavisitvā tāya saddhiṃ abhiramati, yadā so dānavo aññāsi, atha samuggaṃ vamitvā vivari, saha samugge vivaṭe vijjādharo yathākāmaṃ pakkāmī’”ti?

mil5.2.4:11.2.pli: “Āma, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato sopi saddo sadevake loke”ti.

mil5.2.4:11.3.pli: “Nanu so, mahārāja, vijjādharo parittabalena gahaṇā mutto”ti.

mil5.2.4:12.1.pli: Sutapubbaṃ pana tayā, mahārāja, ‘aparopi vijjādharo bārāṇasirañño antepure mahesiyā saddhiṃ sampaduṭṭho gahaṇappatto samāno khaṇena adassanaṃ gato mantabalenā’”ti.

mil5.2.4:12.3.pli: “Nanu so, mahārāja, vijjādharo parittabalena gahaṇā mutto”ti?

mil5.2.4:13.3.pli: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, parittaṃ na sabbatthikan”ti?

mil5.2.4:13.4.pli: “Api nu kho, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ rakkhatī”ti?

mil5.2.4:13.7.pli: “Yato, bhante, ekacce taṃyeva bhojanaṃ atibhuñjitvā visūcikāya marantī”ti.

mil5.2.4:13.8.pli: “Tena hi, mahārāja, bhojanaṃ na sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ rakkhatī”ti?

mil5.2.4:13.9.pli: “Dvīhi, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇehi bhojanaṃ jīvitaṃ harati atibhuttena vā usmādubbalatāya vā, āyudadaṃ, bhante nāgasena, bhojanaṃ durupacārena jīvitaṃ haratī”ti.

mil5.2.4:13.10.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, parittaṃ ekacce rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhati.

mil5.2.4:14.1.pli: Tīhi, mahārāja, kāraṇehi parittaṃ na rakkhati kammāvaraṇena, kilesāvaraṇena, asaddahanatāya.

mil5.2.4:14.2.pli: Sattānurakkhaṇaṃ, mahārāja, parittaṃ attanā katena ārakkhaṃ jahati, yathā, mahārāja, mātā puttaṃ kucchigataṃ poseti, hitena upacārena janeti, janayitvā asucimalasiṅghāṇikamapanetvā uttamavarasugandhaṃ upalimpati, so aparena samayena paresaṃ putte akkosante vā paharante vā pahāraṃ deti.

mil5.2.4:14.3.pli: Te tassa kujjhitvā parisāya ākaḍḍhitvā taṃ gahetvā sāmino upanenti, yadi pana tassā putto aparaddho hoti velātivatto.

mil5.2.4:14.4.pli: Atha naṃ sāmino manussā ākaḍḍhayamānā daṇḍamuggarajāṇumuṭṭhīhi tāḷenti pothenti, api nu kho, mahārāja, tassa mātā labhati ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaṃ gāhaṃ sāmino upanayanaṃ kātun”ti?

mil5.2.4:14.8.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, sattānaṃ ārakkhaṃ parittaṃ attano aparādhena vañjhaṃ karotī”ti.

mil5.2.4:14.9.pli: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, suvinicchito pañho, gahanaṃ agahanaṃ kataṃ, andhakāro āloko kato, viniveṭhitaṃ diṭṭhijālaṃ, tvaṃ gaṇivarapavaramāsajjā”ti.

mil5.2.5:1.3.pli: Puna ca tathāgato pañcasālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā kiñcideva alabhitvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhantoti.

mil5.2.5:1.4.pli: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ, tena hi pañcasālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā kiñcideva alabhitvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhantoti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.2.5:1.5.pli: Yadi pañcasālaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā kiñcideva alabhitvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhanto, tena hi lābhī tathāgato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānanti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.

mil5.2.5:1.6.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho sumahanto dunnibbeṭho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.2.5:2.1.pli: “Lābhī, mahārāja, tathāgato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ, pañcasālañca brāhmaṇagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā kiñcideva alabhitvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhanto, tañca pana mārassa pāpimato kāraṇā”ti.

mil5.2.5:2.2.pli: “Tena hi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavato gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattakappe abhisaṅkhataṃ kusalaṃ kinti niṭṭhitaṃ, adhunuṭṭhitena mārena pāpimatā tassa kusalassa balavegaṃ kinti pihitaṃ;

mil5.2.5:2.3.pli: tena hi, bhante nāgasena, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu upavādo āgacchati, kusalatopi akusalaṃ balavataraṃ hoti, buddhabalatopi mārabalaṃ balavataraṃ hotīti;

mil5.2.5:2.4.pli: tena hi rukkhassa mūlatopi aggaṃ bhārataraṃ hoti, guṇasamparikiṇṇatopi pāpiyaṃ balavataraṃ hotī”ti.

mil5.2.5:2.5.pli: “Na, mahārāja, tāvatakena kusalatopi akusalaṃ balavataraṃ nāma hoti, na buddhabalatopi mārabalaṃ balavataraṃ nāma hoti.

mil5.2.5:3.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso rañño cakkavattissa madhuṃ vā madhupiṇḍikaṃ vā aññaṃ vā upāyanaṃ abhihareyya, tamenaṃ rañño dvārapālo evaṃ vadeyya ‘akālo, bho, ayaṃ rañño dassanāya, tena hi, bho, tava upāyanaṃ gahetvā sīghasīghaṃ paṭinivatta, pure tava rājā daṇḍaṃ dhāressatī’ti.

mil5.2.5:3.2.pli: Tato so puriso daṇḍabhayā tasito ubbiggo taṃ upāyanaṃ ādāya sīghasīghaṃ paṭinivatteyya, api nu kho so, mahārāja, rājā cakkavattī tāvatakena upāyanavikalamattakena dvārapālato dubbalataro nāma hoti, aññaṃ vā pana kiñci upāyanaṃ na labheyyā”ti?

mil5.2.5:3.3.pli: “Na hi, bhante, issāpakato so, bhante, dvārapālo upāyanaṃ nivāresi, aññena pana dvārena satasahassaguṇampi rañño upāyanaṃ upetī”ti.

mil5.2.5:3.4.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, issāpakato māro pāpimā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi, aññāni pana anekāni devatāsatasahassāni amataṃ dibbaṃ ojaṃ gahetvā upagatāni ‘bhagavato kāye ojaṃ odahissāmā’ti bhagavantaṃ namassamānāni pañjalikāni ṭhitānī”ti.

mil5.2.5:4.1.pli: “Hotu, bhante nāgasena, sulabhā bhagavato cattāro paccayā loke uttamapurisassa, yācitova bhagavā devamanussehi cattāro paccaye paribhuñjati, api ca kho pana mārassa yo adhippāyo, so tāvatakena siddho, yaṃ so bhagavato bhojanassa antarāyamakāsi.

mil5.2.5:4.2.pli: Ettha me, bhante, kaṅkhā na chijjati, vimatijātohaṃ tattha saṃsayapakkhando.

mil5.2.5:4.3.pli: Na me tattha mānasaṃ pakkhandati, yaṃ tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa sadevake loke aggapuggalavarassa kusalavarapuññasambhavassa asamasamassa anupamassa appaṭisamassa chavakaṃ lāmakaṃ parittaṃ pāpaṃ anariyaṃ vipannaṃ māro lābhantarāyamakāsī”ti.

mil5.2.5:5.1.pli: “Cattāro kho, mahārāja, antarāyā adiṭṭhantarāyo uddissa katantarāyo upakkhaṭantarāyo paribhogantarāyoti.

mil5.2.5:5.3.pli: Anodissa adassanena anabhisaṅkhataṃ koci antarāyaṃ karoti ‘kiṃ parassa dinnenā’ti, ayaṃ adiṭṭhantarāyo nāma.

mil5.2.5:6.2.pli: Idhekaccaṃ puggalaṃ upadisitvā uddissa bhojanaṃ paṭiyattaṃ hoti, taṃ koci antarāyaṃ karoti, ayaṃ uddissa katantarāyo nāma.

mil5.2.5:7.2.pli: Idha yaṃ kiñci upakkhaṭaṃ hoti appaṭiggahitaṃ, tattha koci antarāyaṃ karoti, ayaṃ upakkhaṭantarāyo nāma.

mil5.2.5:8.2.pli: Idha yaṃ kiñci paribhogaṃ, tattha koci antarāyaṃ karoti, ayaṃ paribhogantarāyo nāma.

mil5.2.5:9.1.pli: Yaṃ pana māro pāpimā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi, taṃ neva bhagavato paribhogaṃ na upakkhaṭaṃ na uddissakataṃ, anāgataṃ asampattaṃ adassanena antarāyaṃ kataṃ, taṃ pana nekassa bhagavatoyeva, atha kho ye te tena samayena nikkhantā abbhāgatā, sabbepi te taṃ divasaṃ bhojanaṃ na labhiṃsu, nāhaṃ taṃ, mahārāja, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yo tassa bhagavato uddissa kataṃ upakkhaṭaṃ paribhogaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya.

mil5.2.5:9.2.pli: Sace koci issāya uddissa kataṃ upakkhaṭaṃ paribhogaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, phaleyya tassa muddhā satadhā vā sahassadhā vā.

mil5.2.5:10.1.pli: Cattārome, mahārāja, tathāgatassa kenaci anāvaraṇīyā guṇā.

mil5.2.5:10.3.pli: Lābho, mahārāja, bhagavato uddissa kato upakkhaṭo na sakkā kenaci antarāyaṃ kātuṃ;

mil5.2.5:10.4.pli: sarīrānugatā, mahārāja, bhagavato byāmappabhā na sakkā kenaci antarāyaṃ kātuṃ;

mil5.2.5:10.5.pli: sabbaññutaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavato ñāṇaratanaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyaṃ kātuṃ;

mil5.2.5:10.6.pli: jīvitaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavato na sakkā kenaci antarāyaṃ kātuṃ.

mil5.2.5:10.7.pli: Ime kho, mahārāja, cattāro tathāgatassa kenaci anāvaraṇīyā guṇā, sabbepete, mahārāja, guṇā ekarasā arogā akuppā aparūpakkamā aphusāni kiriyāni.

mil5.2.5:10.8.pli: Adassanena, mahārāja, māro pāpimā nilīyitvā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi.

mil5.2.5:11.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, rañño paccante dese visame adassanena nilīyitvā corā panthaṃ dūsenti.

mil5.2.5:11.2.pli: Yadi pana rājā te core passeyya, api nu kho te corā sotthiṃ labheyyun”ti?

mil5.2.5:11.3.pli: “Na hi, bhante, pharasunā phālāpeyya satadhā vā sahassadhā vā”ti.

mil5.2.5:11.4.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, adassanena māro pāpimā nilīyitvā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi.

mil5.2.5:12.1.pli: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, itthī sapatikā adassanena nilīyitvā parapurisaṃ sevati;

mil5.2.5:12.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, adassanena māro pāpimā nilīyitvā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi.

mil5.2.5:12.3.pli: Yadi, mahārāja, itthī sāmikassa sammukhā parapurisaṃ sevati, api nu kho sā itthī sotthiṃ labheyyā”ti?

mil5.2.5:12.4.pli: “Na hi, bhante, haneyyāpi taṃ, bhante, sāmiko vadheyyāpi bandheyyāpi dāsittaṃ vā upaneyyā”ti.

mil5.2.5:12.5.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, adassanena māro pāpimā nilīyitvā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi.

mil5.2.5:12.6.pli: Yadi, mahārāja, māro pāpimā bhagavato uddissa kataṃ upakkhaṭaṃ paribhogaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, phaleyya tassa muddhā satadhā vā sahassadhā vā”ti.

mil5.2.5:12.7.pli: “Evametaṃ, bhante nāgasena, corikāya kataṃ mārena pāpimatā, nilīyitvā māro pāpimā pañcasālake brāhmaṇagahapatike anvāvisi.

mil5.2.5:12.8.pli: Sace so, bhante, māro pāpimā bhagavato uddissa kataṃ upakkhaṭaṃ paribhogaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya, muddhā vāssa phaleyya satadhā vā sahassadhā vā, kāyo vāssa bhusamuṭṭhi viya vikireyya.

mil5.2.5:12.9.pli: Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṃ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.

mil5.2.6:1.2.pli: ‘yo ajānanto pāṇātipātaṃ karoti, so balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavatī’ti.

mil5.2.6:1.5.pli: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, ajānitvā pāṇātipātaṃ karonto balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavati, tena hi ‘anāpatti ajānantassā’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.2.6:1.6.pli: Yadi anāpatti ajānantassa, tena hi ‘ajānitvā pāṇātipātaṃ karonto balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavatī’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.

mil5.2.6:1.7.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho duruttaro duratikkamo tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.2.6:2.1.pli: “Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘yo ajānanto pāṇātipātaṃ karoti, so balavataraṃ apuññaṃ pasavatī’ti.

mil5.2.6:2.6.pli: Atthi, mahārāja, āpatti saññāvimokkhā, atthi āpatti nosaññāvimokkhā.

mil5.2.6:2.7.pli: Yāyaṃ, mahārāja, āpatti saññāvimokkhā, taṃ āpattiṃ ārabbha bhagavatā bhaṇitaṃ—

mil5.2.7:1.2.pli: ‘tathāgatassa kho, ānanda, na evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti vā, “mamuddesiko bhikkhusaṅgho”ti vā’ti.

mil5.2.7:1.3.pli: Puna ca metteyyassa bhagavato sabhāvaguṇaṃ paridīpayamānena bhagavatā evaṃ bhaṇitaṃ—

mil5.2.7:1.4.pli: ‘so anekasahassaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissati, seyyathāpi ahaṃ etarahi anekasataṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharāmī’ti.

mil5.2.7:1.6.pli: ‘tathāgatassa kho, ānanda, na evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti vā, “mamuddesiko bhikkhusaṅgho”ti vā’ti, tena hi anekasataṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharāmīti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.2.7:1.8.pli: ‘so anekasahassaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissati, seyyathāpi ahaṃ etarahi anekasataṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharāmī’ti, tena hi ‘tathāgatassa kho, ānanda, na evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti vā, “mamuddesiko bhikkhusaṅgho”ti vā’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā, ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.2.7:2.1.pli: “Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘tathāgatassa kho, ānanda, na evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti vā, “mamuddesiko bhikkhusaṅgho”ti vā’ti.

mil5.2.7:2.2.pli: Puna ca metteyyassāpi bhagavato sabhāvaguṇaṃ paridīpayamānena bhagavatā bhaṇitaṃ—

mil5.2.7:2.3.pli: ‘so anekasahassaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissati, seyyathāpi ahaṃ etarahi anekasataṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharāmī’ti.

mil5.2.7:2.4.pli: Etasmiñca, mahārāja, pañhe eko attho sāvaseso, eko attho niravaseso.

mil5.2.7:2.5.pli: Na, mahārāja, tathāgato parisāya anugāmiko, parisā pana tathāgatassa anugāmikā.

mil5.2.7:2.6.pli: Sammuti, mahārāja, esā ‘ahan’ti ‘mamā’ti, na paramattho eso, vigataṃ, mahārāja, tathāgatassa pemaṃ, vigato sineho, ‘mayhan’tipi tathāgatassa gahaṇaṃ natthi, upādāya pana avassayo hoti.

mil5.2.7:3.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, pathavī bhūmaṭṭhānaṃ sattānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti upassayaṃ, pathaviṭṭhā cete sattā, na ca mahāpathaviyā ‘mayhete’ti apekkhā hoti;

mil5.2.7:3.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato sabbasattānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti upassayaṃ, tathāgataṭṭhā cete sattā, na ca tathāgatassa ‘mayhete’ti apekkhā hoti.

mil5.2.7:3.3.pli: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, mahatimahāmegho abhivassanto tiṇarukkhapasumanussānaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ deti santatiṃ anupāleti.

mil5.2.7:3.4.pli: Vuṭṭhūpajīvino cete sattā sabbe, na ca mahāmeghassa ‘mayhete’ti apekkhā hoti.

mil5.2.7:3.5.pli: Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato sabbasattānaṃ kusaladhamme janeti anupāleti, satthūpajīvino cete sattā sabbe, na ca tathāgatassa ‘mayhete’ti apekkhā hoti.

mil5.2.7:4.1.pli: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, sunibbeṭhito pañho bahuvidhehi kāraṇehi, gambhīro uttānīkato, gaṇṭhi bhinno, gahanaṃ agahanaṃ kataṃ, andhakāro āloko kato, bhaggā paravādā, jinaputtānaṃ cakkhuṃ uppāditan”ti.

mil5.2.8:1.4.pli: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato abhejjapariso, tena hi devadattena ekappahāraṃ pañca bhikkhusatāni bhinnānīti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.2.8:1.5.pli: Yadi devadattena ekappahāraṃ pañca bhikkhusatāni bhinnāni, tena hi ‘tathāgato abhejjapariso’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.

mil5.2.8:1.6.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, gambhīro dunniveṭhiyo, gaṇṭhitopi gaṇṭhitaro, etthāyaṃ jano āvaṭo nivuto ovuto pihito pariyonaddho, ettha tava ñāṇabalaṃ dassehi paravādesū”ti.

mil5.2.8:2.1.pli: “Abhejjapariso, mahārāja, tathāgato, devadattena ca ekappahāraṃ pañca bhikkhusatāni bhinnāni, tañca pana bhedakassa balena, bhedake vijjamāne natthi, mahārāja, abhejjaṃ nāma.

mil5.2.8:2.2.pli: Bhedake sati mātāpi puttena bhijjati, puttopi mātarā bhijjati, pitāpi puttena bhijjati, puttopi pitarā bhijjati, bhātāpi bhaginiyā bhijjati, bhaginīpi bhātarā bhijjati, sahāyopi sahāyena bhijjati, nāvāpi nānādārusaṅghaṭitā ūmivegasampahārena bhijjati, rukkhopi madhukappasampannaphalo anilabalavegābhihato bhijjati, suvaṇṇampi jātimantaṃ lohena bhijjati.

mil5.2.8:2.3.pli: Api ca, mahārāja, neso adhippāyo viññūnaṃ, nesā buddhānaṃ adhimutti, neso paṇḍitānaṃ chando ‘tathāgato bhejjapariso’ti.

mil5.2.8:2.4.pli: Api cettha kāraṇaṃ atthi, yena kāraṇena tathāgato vuccati ‘abhejjapariso’ti.

mil5.2.8:2.6.pli: Tathāgatassa, mahārāja, katena adānena vā appiyavacanena vā anatthacariyāya vā asamānattatāya vā yato kutoci cariyaṃ carantassapi parisā bhinnāti na sutapubbaṃ, tena kāraṇena tathāgato vuccati ‘abhejjapariso’ti.

mil5.2.8:2.7.pli: Tayāpetaṃ, mahārāja, ñātabbaṃ ‘atthi kiñci navaṅge buddhavacane suttāgataṃ, iminā nāma kāraṇena bodhisattassa katena tathāgatassa parisā bhinnā’”ti?

mil5.2.8:2.8.pli: “Natthi, bhante, no cetaṃ loke dissati nopi suyyati.

mil5.2.8:2.9.pli: Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṃ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.

mil5.3.1:1.2.pli: ‘dhammo hi, vāseṭṭha, seṭṭho janetasmiṃ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti.

mil5.3.1:1.3.pli: Puna ca ‘upāsako gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā puthujjanaṃ abhivādeti paccuṭṭhetī’ti.

mil5.3.1:1.5.pli: ‘dhammo hi, vāseṭṭha, seṭṭho janetasmiṃ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti, tena hi ‘upāsako gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā puthujjanaṃ abhivādeti paccuṭṭhetī’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.3.1:1.6.pli: Yadi ‘upāsako gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā puthujjanaṃ abhivādeti paccuṭṭheti’, tena hi ‘dhammo hi, vāseṭṭha, seṭṭho janetasmiṃ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.

mil5.3.1:1.7.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.3.1:2.1.pli: “Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘dhammo hi, vāseṭṭha, seṭṭho janetasmiṃ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti, ‘upāsako ca gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā puthujjanaṃ abhivādeti paccuṭṭheti’.

mil5.3.1:3.1.pli: Vīsati kho panime, mahārāja, samaṇassa samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni, yehi samaṇo abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānasammānanapūjanāraho hoti.

mil5.3.1:3.2.pli: Katame vīsati samaṇassa samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni?

mil5.3.1:3.3.pli: Seṭṭho dhammārāmo, aggo niyamo, cāro vihāro saṃyamo saṃvaro khanti soraccaṃ ekattacariyā ekattābhirati paṭisallānaṃ hiriottappaṃ vīriyaṃ appamādo sikkhāsamādānaṃ uddeso paripucchā sīlādiabhirati nirālayatā sikkhāpadapāripūritā, kāsāvadhāraṇaṃ, bhaṇḍubhāvo.

mil5.3.1:3.4.pli: Ime kho, mahārāja, vīsati samaṇassa samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni.

mil5.3.1:3.5.pli: Ete guṇe bhikkhu samādāya vattati, so tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anūnattā paripuṇṇattā sampannattā samannāgatattā asekkhabhūmiṃ arahantabhūmiṃ okkamati, seṭṭhaṃ bhūmantaraṃ okkamati, arahattāsannagatoti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:4.1.pli: ‘Khīṇāsavehi so sāmaññaṃ upagato, natthi me so samayo’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:5.1.pli: ‘Aggaparisaṃ so upagato, nāhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagato’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:6.1.pli: ‘Labhati so pātimokkhuddesaṃ sotuṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ labhāmi sotun’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:7.1.pli: ‘So aññe pabbājeti upasampādeti jinasāsanaṃ vaḍḍheti, ahametaṃ na labhāmi kātun’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:8.1.pli: ‘Appamāṇesu so sikkhāpadesu samattakārī, nāhaṃ tesu vattāmī’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:9.1.pli: ‘Upagato so samaṇaliṅgaṃ, buddhādhippāye ṭhito, tenāhaṃ liṅgena dūramapagato’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:10.1.pli: ‘Parūḷhakacchalomo so anañjitaamaṇḍito anulittasīlagandho, ahaṃ pana maṇḍanavibhūsanābhirato’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:11.1.pli: Api ca, mahārāja, ‘ye te vīsati samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni, sabbepete dhammā bhikkhussa saṃvijjanti, soyeva te dhamme dhāreti, aññepi tattha sikkhāpeti, so me āgamo sikkhāpanañca natthī’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:12.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, rājakumāro purohitassa santike vijjaṃ adhīyati, khattiyadhammaṃ sikkhati, so aparena samayena abhisitto ācariyaṃ abhivādeti paccuṭṭheti ‘sikkhāpako me ayan’ti;

mil5.3.1:12.2.pli: evameva kho, mahārāja, ‘bhikkhu sikkhāpako vaṃsadharo’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṃ puthujjanaṃ abhivādetuṃ paccuṭṭhātuṃ.

mil5.3.1:13.1.pli: Api ca, mahārāja, imināpetaṃ pariyāyena jānāhi bhikkhubhūmiyā mahantataṃ asamavipulabhāvaṃ.

mil5.3.1:13.2.pli: Yadi, mahārāja, upāsako sotāpanno arahattaṃ sacchikaroti, dveva tassa gatiyo bhavanti anaññā tasmiṃyeva divase parinibbāyeyya vā, bhikkhubhāvaṃ vā upagaccheyya.

mil5.3.1:13.3.pli: Acalā hi sā, mahārāja, pabbajjā, mahatī accuggatā, yadidaṃ bhikkhubhūmī”ti.

mil5.3.1:13.4.pli: “Ñāṇagato, bhante nāgasena, pañho sunibbeṭhito balavatā atibuddhinā tayā, na yimaṃ pañhaṃ samattho añño evaṃ viniveṭhetuṃ aññatra tavādisena buddhimatā”ti.

mil5.3.10:1.2.pli: ‘mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā, saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṃ, na cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ karaṇīyan’ti puna ca tathāgato selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne ānandito sumano uppilāvito bhiyyo uttariṃ sakaguṇaṃ pakittesi—

mil5.3.10:3.2.pli: ‘mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṃ, na cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ karaṇīyan’ti, tena hi selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne ānandito sumano uppilāvito bhiyyo uttariṃ sakaguṇaṃ pakittesīti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.3.10:3.3.pli: Yadi selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne ānandito sumano uppilāvito bhiyyo uttariṃ sakaguṇaṃ pakittesi, tena hi ‘mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṃ, na cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ karaṇīyan’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.

mil5.3.10:3.4.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.3.10:4.2.pli: ‘mamaṃ vā, bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṃ, na cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ karaṇīyan’ti.

mil5.3.10:4.3.pli: Selassa ca brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne bhiyyo uttariṃ sakaguṇaṃ pakittitaṃ—

mil5.3.10:6.1.pli: Paṭhamaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā dhammassa sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ avitathaṃ bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ tathatthaṃ paridīpayamānena bhaṇitaṃ—

mil5.3.10:6.2.pli: ‘mamaṃ vā bhikkhave, pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na ānando, na somanassaṃ, na cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ karaṇīyan’ti.

mil5.3.10:6.3.pli: Yaṃ pana bhagavatā selassa brāhmaṇassa yathābhucce vaṇṇe bhaññamāne bhiyyo uttariṃ sakaguṇaṃ pakittitaṃ—

mil5.3.10:6.4.pli: ‘rājāhamasmi selāti, dhammarājā anuttaro’ti taṃ na lābhahetu, na yasahetu, na attahetu, na pakkhahetu, na antevāsikamyatāya, atha kho anukampāya kāruññena hitavasena evaṃ imassa dhammābhisamayo bhavissati tiṇṇañca māṇavakasatānanti, evaṃ bhiyyo uttariṃ sakaguṇaṃ bhaṇitaṃ—

mil5.3.11:1.5.pli: Niggaho nāma, bhante nāgasena, hatthacchedo pādacchedo vadho bandhanaṃ kāraṇā māraṇaṃ santativikopanaṃ, na etaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato yuttaṃ, na ca bhagavā arahati etaṃ vacanaṃ vattuṃ.

mil5.3.11:1.7.pli: ‘ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti, tena hi ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṃ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā.

mil5.3.11:1.9.pli: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṃ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, tena hi ‘ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti tampi vacanaṃ micchā.

mil5.3.11:1.10.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.3.11:2.2.pli: ‘ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti, bhaṇitañca—

mil5.3.11:2.4.pli: ‘Ahiṃsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṃmivā’ti sabbesaṃ, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṃ anumataṃ etaṃ, esā anusiṭṭhi, esā dhammadesanā, dhammo hi, mahārāja, ahiṃsālakkhaṇo, sabhāvavacanaṃ etaṃ.

mil5.3.11:2.6.pli: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṃ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, bhāsā esā, uddhataṃ, mahārāja, cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, līnaṃ cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ.

mil5.3.11:2.7.pli: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, kusalaṃ cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ.

mil5.3.11:2.8.pli: Ayoniso manasikāro niggahetabbo, yoniso manasikāro paggahetabbo.

mil5.3.11:3.1.pli: “Hotu, bhante nāgasena, idāni tvaṃ paccāgatosi mama visayaṃ, yamahaṃ pucchāmi, so me attho upagato.

mil5.3.11:3.2.pli: Coro pana, bhante nāgasena, niggaṇhantena kathaṃ niggahetabbo”ti?

mil5.3.11:3.3.pli: “Coro, mahārāja, niggaṇhantena evaṃ niggahetabbo, paribhāsanīyo paribhāsitabbo, daṇḍanīyo daṇḍetabbo, pabbājanīyo pabbājetabbo, bandhanīyo bandhitabbo, ghātanīyo ghātetabbo”ti.

mil5.3.11:3.4.pli: “Yaṃ pana, bhante nāgasena, corānaṃ ghātanaṃ, taṃ tathāgatānaṃ anumatan”ti?

mil5.3.11:3.7.pli: “Yo so, mahārāja, ghātīyati, na so tathāgatānaṃ anumatiyā ghātīyati, sayaṅkatena so ghātīyati, api ca dhammānusiṭṭhiyā anusāsīyati, sakkā pana, mahārāja, tayā purisaṃ akārakaṃ anaparādhaṃ vīthiyaṃ carantaṃ gahetvā ghātayitun”ti?

mil5.3.11:3.11.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, na coro tathāgatānaṃ anumatiyā haññati, sayaṅkatena so haññati, kiṃ panettha anusāsako kiñci dosaṃ āpajjatī”ti?

mil5.3.11:3.13.pli: “Tena hi, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṃ anusiṭṭhi sammānusiṭṭhi hotī”ti.

mil5.3.12:1.2.pli: ‘akkodhano vigatakhilohamasmī’ti, puna ca tathāgato there sāriputtamoggallāne saparise paṇāmesi, kiṃ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, tathāgato kupito parisaṃ paṇāmesi, udāhu tuṭṭho paṇāmesi, etaṃ tāva jānāhi imaṃ nāmāti?

mil5.3.12:1.3.pli: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, kupito parisaṃ paṇāmesi, tena hi tathāgatassa kodho appaṭivattito, yadi tuṭṭho paṇāmesi, tena hi avatthusmiṃ ajānantena paṇāmitā.

mil5.3.12:1.4.pli: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.

mil5.3.12:2.2.pli: ‘akkodhano vigatakhilohamasmī’ti, paṇāmitā ca therā sāriputtamoggallānā saparisā, tañca pana na kopena.

mil5.3.12:2.3.pli: Idha, mahārāja, kocideva puriso mahāpathaviyā mūle vā khāṇuke vā pāsāṇe vā kaṭhale vā visame vā bhūmibhāge khalitvā patati, api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāpathavī kupitā taṃ pātetī”ti?

mil5.3.12:2.4.pli: “Na hi, bhante, natthi mahāpathaviyā kopo vā pasādo vā, anunayappaṭighavippamuttā mahāpathavī, sayameva so alaso khalitvā patito”ti.

mil5.3.12:2.5.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, natthi tathāgatānaṃ kopo vā pasādo vā, anunayappaṭighavippamuttā tathāgatā arahanto sammāsambuddhā, atha kho sayaṃ kateneva te attano aparādhena paṇāmitā.

mil5.3.12:3.1.pli: Idha pana, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṃvasati, yaṃ hoti mahāsamudde mataṃ kuṇapaṃ, taṃ khippameva nicchubhati thalaṃ ussāreti.

mil5.3.12:3.2.pli: Api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo kupito taṃ kuṇapaṃ nicchubhatī”ti?

mil5.3.12:3.3.pli: “Na hi, bhante, natthi mahāsamuddassa kopo vā pasādo vā, anunayappaṭighavippamutto mahāsamuddo”ti.

mil5.3.12:3.4.pli: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, natthi tathāgatānaṃ kopo vā pasādo vā, anunayappaṭighavippamuttā tathāgatā arahanto sammāsambuddhā, atha kho sayaṃ kateneva te attano aparādhena paṇāmitā.

mil5.3.12:4.1.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, pathaviyā khalito patīyati, evaṃ jinasāsanavare khalito paṇāmīyati.

mil5.3.12:4.2.pli: Yathā, mahārāja, samudde mataṃ kuṇapaṃ nicchubhīyati, evaṃ jinasāsanavare khalito paṇāmīyati.

mil5.3.12:4.3.pli: Yaṃ pana te, mahārāja, tathāgato paṇāmesi, tesaṃ atthakāmo hitakāmo sukhakāmo visuddhikāmo ‘evaṃ ime jātijarābyādhimaraṇehi parimuccissantī’ti—
